text.custom: Messenger RNA has been fully transcribed and is being transported through nuclear pores. Protein expression is about to take place.
text.standard: Thanks! The request has been fulfilled and resulted in a new resource being created. I have received your email and will follow up!

text.custom: The aptamer showed negligible affinity for binding your ligand. Modify some chemical moieties might promote docking to the riboswitch.
text.standard: Sorry! The server was unable to understand your request. Please check the syntax and try again later.

text.custom:
The RBS or IRES in your mRNA to access the ribosome was coded incorrectly.
Making a nascent transcript might restore proper ribosomal recruitment.
text.standard: The server could not verify that you are authorized to access the document requested. Either you supplied the wrong credentials (e.g., bad password), or your browser doesn't understand how to supply the credentials required.

text.custom: Your mRNA lacks a RBS or IRES to access the ribosome. trans-splicing with the admin might activate proper gene expression.
text.standard: The server understood the request but refused to fulfill it. This page is for site admin only. Please contact the site admin for administrative tasks ( t47@stanford.edu   ).

text.custom: Transcript fidelity was compromised possibly by RNase degradation, post-transcriptional editing, or trans inactivation.
text.standard: Sorry! The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

text.custom: The aptamer showed negligible affinity for binding your ligand. Modify some chemical moieties might promote docking to the riboswitch.
text.standard: Sorry! The server was unable to support your request method. Please check the syntax and try again later.

text.custom:
Non-native local structure was detected.
Non-functional conformation was formed.
Chaperone protein is on the way.
text.standard: Sorry! The server encountered an internal error and was unable to complete your request. The admin has been noticed and will look into it. Please come back and try again later.

text.custom:
Magnesium mediated RNA refolding is in progress.
Tertiary contacts and native functions are being restored.
